text: 11|57|ini ninnal pintirinn kalayukayanenkil, nan ninnalute atuttekk ayakkappettat etearu karyavumayittanea at nan ninnalkk etticcutannittuntâ€Œ. ninnalallatta oru janataye enre raksitav pakaram keantuvarunnatumanâ€Œ. avann yatearu upadravavum varuttan ninnalkkavilla. tirccayayum enre raksitav ella karyavum sanraksicc pearunnavanakunnu
